channel.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
channel.description:
Well, about three years back my older brother (~N~, -N-, N-ick, & Mindfreakthakur or just Nick irl), started getting into RuneScape Private Servers, and it was when RuneScape was in it's prime. I was interested but a naive 12 or 13 year old who knew nothing about servers, so I just followed my brothers instructions and played the original MoparScape with Aryan. For the longest time it was awesome, but then we got into different servers (Stranded Isle for example), and played those. After about a half year, my brother joined MoparScape, and he created his first sever (Fallen Isle). Throughout the years I went on playing different games as he worked on various servers getting his main help from MoparScape, until releasing about 3 other servers. One day he filled shits 'cause he was banned from MoparScape for making another account (Which he didn't know was against the rules because he never READ the freakin' rules) and he pretty much dropped what he was doing on his server (Vengeance-Frenzy V2). He tried RuneLocus and he tried Rune-Sever and he got somewhere with the C&P tutorials (Fail ftw), but he eventually gave up servers about a week after being banned.
So, what I'm asking is,
Is my computer banned from MoparScape forever due to my brother's retardedness? If so, I'm going to probably NOT want to make my server, and end up leaving behind a great server and source I've started on.
(If you are wondering how I'm asking this, I'm on my grandma's computer hehe.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

Yeah, we can’t just unban his IP like that can we? He might actually be the guy that owned the acc, trying to get unbanned.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Lol you’re not being flamed Nirvana. Its only Telinem’s opinion, no one has flamed you yet…the only thing close to it is elijah and he’s just being pretty annoying in that post.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana1 Nirvana.
item.description:
@Nirvana1 wrote:

Alrighty then. Anyway I’m probably just going to Rune-Server or RuneLocus. Way less flamers and way more lax.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Wow, moderators do it way too easy, they don’t even know if you’re him, to be honest they shouldn’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana1 Nirvana.
item.description:
@Nirvana1 wrote:

Can you? That would be nice. I can rub it in his face nao. ^^ Anyway, I’m going to IRC.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Talk to me or another mod on the IRC I guess, it sound’s like your brother was IP banned.

However, I can change that to just a ban on his account and allow you to have your account.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana1 Nirvana.
item.description:
@Nirvana1 wrote:

I’m using my grandma’s computer because I just wanted to see if our computer would be blocked forever, I don’t want to have to come up here everytime I need to go on MoparScape. And holy crap, I realized how easy it is to be suspected as my brother. I might go to IRC later tonight, but not now.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @barelypassing barelypassing
item.description:
@barelypassing wrote:

Dang… you beat me to the post Telenim.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)

item.title: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Moderators and administrators will suspect you being him if they view your profile and his profile(s) they will be the same IP/ISP - and you saying this will also make them think, the excuse ‘it was my brother!!!’ has been used too many times and not many people get away with it, the ban would most likely be permanent, you can ask on IRC about it though, there are some staff members there.

I bet you’ll be banned if you’re using the same computer your brother was banned on.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys. (An introduction & a question about my dillemma.)
